name: The Fool's Swing
description:
Short game that I created for my game art class that shows all art assets that I created throughout the Spring 2021 semester.

Regardless of the controls menu, the only movement keys are A and D. Press the space bar to jump. Click on the left mouse button to attack.

There are enemies in the game, which you need to activate them from the invisible triggers on the ground that spawns the enemies while you run on the floor. 

There is a red button in each of the three levels that takes you back to the main menu.

This will only work for computers that run Windows.
